["",{"text":"Introduction","underlined":true},{"text":"
Welcome to the only magical handbook you'll ever need! Within the pages of this tome, you'll find a comprehensive guide to getting your magical operation off the ground "},{"color":"gray","text":"(not literally)"},{"text":". Good luck with your endeavors, young arcanist! Have fun and stay safe!"}]

["",{"text":"Areas of Study","underlined":true},{"text":"
Arcane magic focuses on three different domains: "},{"color":"red","text":"Alchemy"},{"text":", the study of potion-making and transformation; "},{"color":"dark_aqua","text":"Enchantment"},{"text":", the study of improving objects using wordcraft; and "},{"color":"dark_purple","text":"Infusion"},{"text":", the study of combining powerful magical forces."}]

["",{"text":"Each domain requires different ingredients, equipment and placement of components - As such, you will need a specialized Crafting Station to delve into these advanced studies. "},{"color":"black","text":"The"},{"color":"red","text":" Alchemy Cauldron"},{"text":", "},{"color":"dark_aqua","text":"Runic Codex"},{"text":", or "},{"color":"dark_purple","text":"Infusion Circle"},{"text":".
 "}]
{"text":"Each of these Crafting Stations can be found across the world, or crafted by a professional craftsperson at their discretion using a mundane Crafting Table."}

["",{"text":"Arcane Formulas","underlined":true},{"text":"
These advanced techniques are too complex for average crafters - You will need to follow Arcane (✦) Formulas to create magical items and effects.
These formula are created from Research in their respective station."}]

Alchemy, Runic & Infusion Research can be found in all corners of the world, from cryptic libraries to sunken villages.
Once you have this research in hand, you can translate and expand the research into a Formula quickly using these recipes:"}]
